feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Mon, 06 Nov 2023 08:03:27
entry.summary:
Tech:
- GPT-4 can pass the bar exam but has a decent chance of passing the CFA exams.
- Kai-Fu Lee's LLM startup, valued at $1B, unveils an open-source model.
- Together AI releases RedPajama v2, an open dataset for training large language models.
- New BeagleV Single Board Computer adopts Microchip's PolarFire SoC with FPGA.
- Imperial College London develops an AI method for few-shot imitation learning.

Business:
- Trump plans to use the DOJ to investigate high-profile critics if he wins a second term.
- Bill Ackman calls on Harvard to take action against antisemitic and pro-Palestinian actions on campus.
- Consumers are paying more for streaming TV each month.
- Developing AI models or GPU clusters? Uncle Sam wants to talk.
- Tyson recalls 30,000 pounds of dinosaur-shaped chicken nuggets due to metal pieces.

AI:
- GPT-4 and ChatGPT have passed difficult exams.
- Imperial College London develops an AI method for few-shot imitation learning.

Others:
- 'Seven' takes place in Gotham, and David Fincher should make a 'Batman' movie.
- ULM falls at Southern Miss in a football game.
- 'Fear The Walking Dead' Season 8, Episode 9 review.
- Game report: Plymouth City Patriots defeat London Lions in the British Basketball League.
- Obituary for Moesha Shields.
- Pomerantz Law Firm investigates claims.
- Survivors and officials attend a state memorial honoring firefighters.
- Sheila E. and family honored for National Hispanic/Latinx Heritage Month celebration.
- Wiley College rebrands as Wiley University during homecoming.
- NAACP presents a ten-point voter action plan for a safer Oakland.
- Annemarie Wiley teases 'The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills.'
- US troops experience post-war trauma after battles with the Islamic State.
- Maryland Gov. Wes Moore brings a message of patriotism to Virginia's legislative elections.
- Middle-schooler wins $25,000 for inventing a faster fire-detection device.
- Russian troops face grueling conditions on the front line, according to UK intel.
- Console #182 features an interview with Alberto of Solidus, an open-source eCommerce framework.
- Q&A with execs at Harlem's first legal dispensary.
